official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage of annual preventive examinations under part B of the medicare program.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide coverage for annual preventive examinations under Medicare part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance).
